Class BST

java.lang.Object
  BST

public class BST
extends java.lang.Object

Purpose: Develop the BST class that mimics a Binary Search Tree using a network of TreeNodes.

Date: 2010 04 17

Author:
M. Ingram

Constructor Summary
BST()
          Constructs a BST object encapsulating a binary search tree into 'root'.
BST(java.lang.String code)
          Constructs a BST object from the parameter containing the encoded Binary Search Tree.

Constructor Detail

BST

public BST()
Constructs a BST object encapsulating a binary search tree into 'root'. Hard codes the Character data: 'J', 'A', 'V', 'A' as the node values in one statement (manually).

BST

public BST(java.lang.String code)
Constructs a BST object from the parameter containing the encoded Binary Search Tree.

Parameters:
code - the encoded binary search tree
